attributes.action: Allow restaurants to serve single household parties under Tier 3 restrictions
attributes.additional_details:
Hospitality has been decimated by government restrictions, far beyond what leisure & retail sectors have. 
How can the restrictions be justified not to allow single household dining when the majority of other sectors in the UK can trade accordingly
attributes.background: Vote for an amendment to the new restrictions on tiers so that restaurants can offer single household dining provisions under tier 3 regulations

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a simlar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561917

Under Tier 3 rules households cannot mix indoors, so we think the request made by the above petition would achieve the same outcome as your petition.
